title: Bug 6125 - JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When pressing finish, the JAR creation fails with the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'.
OB: When trying to create a JAR file using the JAR packager, the creation process fails with the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'.
EB: I expect to be able to create a JAR file even if some editors are unsaved. If there are unsaved editors, there should be a dialog prompting the user to save before proceeding with the JAR creation process.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the JAR packager wizard.
2. Do not save any of the open editors.
3. Fill in all the necessary fields.
4. Click on the 'Finish' button to create the JAR.
5. Observe the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'.
